categories: Category:Imperial Department of Military Research products

nodes.text: The Emperor's Royal Guard stormtrooper armor was a model of stormtrooper armor used by the Emperor's Royal Guard. While it was otherwise similar to regular stormtrooper armor in appearance, the only difference was that it was red. The color echoed the standard uniform of the Emperor's Royal Guard. Two squads of Royal Guard donning this armor were given to the Dark Lady of the Sith Lumiya by Imperial Intelligence Director Ysanne Isard.
